alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 5:04PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval, southeastern McMullen, northwestern Jim Wells and southwestern Live Oak Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 504 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rancho De La Parita, or 15 miles north of San Diego, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tecalote, Rosita and Rancho De La Parita. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 660 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 744 and 754. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Jim Wells; Live Oak; McMullen
